overview: Pedra Mendalza is halfway between a documentary and a feature movie. The docufiction exposes ancient sardinian “power places” from hystorical, cultural, archeological and energetical points of view crossing over magical and folkloristic local traditions.  It’s a totally digital work, advanced videophotographic techniques for an analogical, unsequential, visionary drive. Mental feedbacks and forseeings, a stream of consciousness. The rich soundtrack, leads often the experience, overwriting the script. Pedra Mendalza is a digital tale with music.
title: Pedra Mendalza
